headerText: The `v-feature-discovery` component can contain 4 different elements: target, the element about what you're telling to user, title, text and actions, which can trigger various events.

usage.desc: You can use different targets for `v-feature-discovery`.

fab.desc: The most often used with `v-feature-discovery` components are FABs and icons.

toolbar.desc: You can even tell users about useful icons on a toolbar.

persistent.desc: Persistent `v-feature-discovery` can't be closed any way, except its model.

flat.desc: If you pass a `flat` property to `v-feature-discovery`, it will display without elevation.

no-ripple.desc: `v-feature-discovery` with a `no-ripple` property displays without ripple animation around the highlighted area.

elevation.desc: `v-feature-discovery` has elevation of 4 by default, but you can customize elevation using the `elevation` prop.

size.desc: `v-feature-discovery` has default size equal to 700px, but you can set size using the `size` prop of `v-feature-discovery` component.

props.target: An element or a CSS selector of it. Will be used as target for `v-feature-discovery`.
props.highlightColor: The color for highlight and ripple (if enabled).
